deb_packages.query: select * from deb_packages where name like '%ssl%' OR name like '%crypto%';
deb_packages.description: Retrieves all the installed DEB packages in the target Linux system.

portage_packages.query: select * from portage_packages where package like '%ssl%' OR package like '%crypto%';
portage_packages.description: Retrieves all the installed packages on the target Linux system.

rpm_packages.query: select * from rpm_packages where name like '%ssl%' OR name like '%crypto%';
rpm_packages.description: Retrieves all the installed RPM packages in the target Linux system.

python_packages.query: select * from python_packages where name like '%ssl%' OR name like '%crypto%';

windows_programs.query: select * from programs where name like '%ssl%' OR name like '%crypto%';
windows_programs.description: Retrieves the list of products as they are installed by Windows Installer in the target Windows system.

homebrew_packages.query: SELECT * FROM homebrew_packages where name like '%ssl%' OR name like '%crypto%';

kernel_keys.description: List of security data, authentication keys and encryption keys.

yum_sources.description: Current list of Yum repositories or software channels.
